name: Imbattable - Tome 1 - Justice et légumes frais
summary: He may be an average looking, unassuming guy in wrestling tights and a mask, but he manages to frequently save the day through his amazing – and sometimes unexplainable – ability to bend the laws of space and time… by reaching outside the panels of this comic book to affect things in the surrounding panels! This first issue introduces him to others with interesting comic-powered powers: Two-Dee and The Wordsmith, as well as the villainous JESTER!
info:
